name: Sebastian Lobbe
label: Bachelor of Science ETH in Physics
summary: Physics Graduate · Aspiring Software Developer · Skilled in Python, Data Analysis and Statistics

work_experience.summary: Assisting in gardening and landscaping tasks, including pruning and maintaining gardens and landscapes. This role involves physical labor and teamwork to maintain outdoor spaces.

Exam corrector for the course "Mathematical Methods in Physics I" for BSc Mathematics and BSc Physics at ETH Zurich. The course covers mathematical techniques for modeling and analyzing physical systems, with a focus on waves, quantum phenomena, and differential equations.

other_experience.summary: Participant in the winter academy on the topic "With the Einsteinmobile to the quantum computer" for school students at TU Dortmund University.

Internship in the production facility of C.D. Waelzholz in the field of metal processing as electronics technician and process mechanic. The internship was part of the mandatory internship at Hildegardis-Schule Hagen.
Student of the English language course at the Europa School of English in Bournemouth, England. Improving my communication skills, learning strategies and cultural awareness.

comments: Intermediate semester to be qualified to study practical computer science at master level in winter semester 2025/2026
Visiting the courses "Introduction to Object Oriented Programming" and "Introduction to Technical and Theoretical Computer Science"
Focus: Data analysis and particle physics
Focus: Practicals, data analysis, quantum mechanics, and electrodynamics
